segments.text: It is high time you have a talk with him . That may help clear the mists .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did , but he gives me a runaround .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I were you , I would put the whole matter on the table .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But he was trying to beat about the bush . And my talk with him was fruitless .
segments.speaker: S2
